description.english: Complete a level as a Valkyrie without possessing any Vikings
description.french: Terminer un niveau en tant que valkyrie, sans prendre possession d'un viking
description.german: Absolviere einen Level als Walküre, ohne von einem Wikinger Besitz zu ergreifen
description.polish: Ukończ poziom jako Walkiria, bez opętywania żadnego Wikinga
description.spanish: Completa un nivel como valquiria sin poseer vikingos.
description.russian: Пройдите уровень, играя только за валькирию и не управляя викингами
description.brazilian: Conclua uma fase com uma Valquíria sem possuir nenhum Viking
description.turkish: Bir bölümü hiçbir Viking'e hükmetmeden Valkür olarak tamamla.
description.tchinese: 在沒有操控任何一名維京的情況下以瓦爾基裏通過一關
description.schinese: 在没有操控任何一名维京的情况下以瓦尔基里通过一关

description.english: Only go right in one level
description.french: Aller seulement à droite dans un niveau
description.german: Bewege dich in einem Level nur nach rechts
description.polish: Idź tylko w prawo przez cały poziom
description.spanish: Dirígete siempre a la derecha en un nivel.
description.brazilian: Vá apenas para a direita em uma fase

description.english: Finish a level without getting hit
description.french: Terminer un niveau sans être touché
description.german: Absolviere einen Level, ohne getroffen zu werden
description.polish: Ukończ poziom nie otrzymując żadnych obrażeń
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin ser golpeado.
description.russian: Пройдите уровень, не пропустив ни одного удара
description.brazilian: Termine uma fase sem ser atingido
description.turkish: Bir bölümü hiç hasar almadan tamamla.
description.tchinese: 沒有受到攻擊的情況下通過一關
description.schinese: 没有受到攻击的情况下通过一关

description.english: Collect 100,000 glory
description.french: Collecter 100 000 de gloire
description.spanish: Consigue 100 000 de gloria.
description.brazilian: Colete 100.000 de Glória

displayName.tchinese: 哦親愛的我簡直棒極了!
displayName.schinese: 哦亲爱的我简直棒极了!

description.english: Collect 1,000,000 glory
description.french: Collecter 1 000 000 de gloire
description.spanish: Consigue 1 000 000 de gloria.
description.brazilian: Colete 1.000.000 de Glória

displayName.french: Un bon viking connaît ses outils

description.english: Unlock all standard clans
description.french: Débloquer tous les clans standard
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los clanes normales.
description.russian: Откройте доступ ко всем стандартным кланам
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os clãs básicos

description.english: Perform 20 Perfect Summons
description.french: Réaliser 20 invocations parfaites
description.spanish: Realiza 20 invocaciones perfectas.
description.brazilian: Realize 20 invocações perfeitas

displayName.french: L'art de l'invocation et du zen
displayName.german: Zen und die Kunst des Beschwörens
displayName.spanish: Senséi del arte de la invocación
displayName.brazilian: Zen e a Arte da Invocação

description.english: Perform 100 Perfect Summons
description.french: Réaliser 100 invocations parfaites
description.spanish: Realiza 100 invocaciones perfectas.
description.brazilian: Realize 100 invocações perfeitas

description.english: Kill an Enemy as a Trap
description.french: Tuer un ennemi en tant que piège à loup
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo con una trampa mientras la controlas.
description.brazilian: Mate um inimigo como armadilha

displayName.english: A Very Particular Set of Skills
displayName.spanish: Un conjunto muy particular de habilidades

description.english: Collect 15 skills on your Valkyrie profile
description.french: Collecter 15 compétences sur votre profil valkyrie
description.spanish: Acumula 15 habilidades en el perfil de tu valquiria.
description.polish: Zdobądź 15 umiejętności na karcie twojej Walkirii
description.brazilian: Obtenha 15 habilidades no seu perfil de Valquíria
description.tchinese: 在瓦爾基裏頁面上收集15個技能
description.schinese: 在瓦尔基里页面上收集15个技能

description.english: Collect 25 skills on your Valkyrie profile
description.french: Collecter 25 compétences sur votre profil valkyrie
description.spanish: Acumula 25 habilidades en el perfil de tu valquiria.
description.polish: Zdobądź 25 umiejętności na karcie twojej Walkirii
description.brazilian: Colete 25 habilidades no seu perfil de Valquíria
description.tchinese: 在瓦爾基裏頁面上收集25個技能
description.schinese: 在瓦尔基里页面上收集25个技能

description.english: On the upgrade screen, waste all your moves on empty spaces
description.french: Sur l'écran des améliorations, utilisez tous vos mouvements sur des espaces vides
description.german: Verschwende im Aufwertungsbildschirm alle deine Aktionen für leere Plätze.
description.polish: Na ekranie ulepszeń zużyj wszystkie ruchy na pustych polach
description.spanish: En la pantalla de mejora, malgasta todos tus movimientos en espacios vacíos.
description.russian: Потратьте все свои ходы на экране улучшения на пустые клетки
description.brazilian: Na tela de melhorias, gaste todos os seus golpes em espaços vazios
description.turkish: Geliştirme ekranındaki tüm hareketlerini boşluklarda kullan.
description.tchinese: 在升級頁面上把你所有的移動都浪費到空白處
description.schinese: 在升级页面上把你所有的移动都浪费到空白处

displayName.german: Was soll ich sagen – ich mag große Zahlen!

description.english: Reach 500 points in any stat
description.french: Atteindre 500 points sur une stat
description.spanish: Alcanza los 500 puntos en cualquier atributo.
description.brazilian: Atinja 500 pontos em qualquer atributo
description.tchinese: 在任何狀態中到達500點數
description.schinese: 在任何状态中到达500点数

description.schinese: 在任何状态中到达1000点数

displayName.german: Warum ohne Fass, wenn’s auch mit geht?

description.spanish: Mata a 200 enemigos con barriles.
description.brazilian: Mate 200 inimigos com barris

description.english: Perform a Multikill 100 times

description.brazilian: Execute mortes múltiplas 100 vezes

description.english: Use your Viking's ultimate ability 20 times

description.turkish: Viking'in en üst düzey yeteneğini 20 kez kullan.

description.english: Use your Viking's ultimate ability 50 times

description.turkish: Viking'in en üst düzey yeteneğini 50 kez kullan.

description.french: Tuer un troll

description.english: Kill an enemy while possessing another enemy

description.german: Töte einen Feind, während du von einem anderen Feind Besitz ergriffen hast
